dataIntro.header: This website is to demo how stack process in a last in, first out manner!
dataIntro.inputNumber: Enter a number into the Stack
dataIntro.pushButton: This button will push the number you enter unto the top of the stack.
dataIntro.popButton: This button will pop the top number from the stack.
dataIntro.peekButton: This button will peek at the top number from the stack.
dataIntro.sizeButton: This button will display the size of the stack in the logs.
dataIntro.emptyButton: This button will display whether the stack is empty or not in the logs.
dataIntro.stack: This is where the stack will be displayed.
dataIntro.logs: This is where logs related to the stack will be displayed.
